summary: This document contains financial statements related to Jeffrey Epstein's accounts with Bear Stearns & Co. Inc. It outlines the account details, including repurchase agreements and margin trading risks, as well as the company's net capital requirements. The document highlights the financial activities and obligations associated with Epstein's accounts.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

keyFacts: The document details financial transactions and account statements for Jeffrey Epstein's account with Bear Stearns & Co. Inc.
It mentions outstanding repurchase agreements totaling approximately $19,110,312.
The document outlines the risks associated with margin trading, including potential losses exceeding deposits.
Bear Stearns & Co. Inc. is noted to have significant net capital exceeding regulatory requirements.
The document includes references to the company's practices regarding order routing for securities transactions.
